sqlMap.statement:
SELECT SUBSTR(STATCYM, 1, 4) AS STATCY, STNDMSGUSEYN, ( SUM(S1MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S2MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S3MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S4MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S5MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S6MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S7MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S8MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S9MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S10MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S11MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S12MNTRSMTNOITM) ) AS YNTRSMTNOITM, ( SUM(S1MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S2MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S3MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S4MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S5MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S6MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S7MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S8MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S9MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S10MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S11MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S12MNERRNOITM) ) AS YNERRNOITM FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIST04
TRIM(STNDMSGUSEYN) LIKE '%'||#stndMsgUseYn#||'%'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(STATCYM, 1, 4), STNDMSGUSEYN ORDER BY SUBSTR(STATCYM, 1, 4), STNDMSGUSEYN

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, TMP1.* FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(STATCYM, 1, 4) AS STATCY, STNDMSGUSEYN, ( SUM(S1MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S2MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S3MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S4MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S5MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S6MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S7MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S8MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S9MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S10MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S11MNERRNOITM) + SUM(S12MNERRNOITM) ) AS YNERRNOITM FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIST04 WHERE STATCYM LIKE '%'||#startDate#||'%'
TRIM(STNDMSGUSEYN) LIKE '%'||#stndMsgUseYn#||'%'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(STATCYM, 1, 4), STNDMSGUSEYN ORDER BY YNERRNOITM DESC ) TMP1 ) A WHERE ROWNUM < 20+1 ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, TMP1.* FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(STATCYM, 1, 4) AS STATCY, STNDMSGUSEYN, ( SUM(S1MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S2MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S3MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S4MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S5MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S6MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S7MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S8MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S9MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S10MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S11MNTRSMTNOITM) + SUM(S12MNTRSMTNOITM) ) AS YNTRSMTNOITM FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIST04 WHERE STATCYM LIKE '%'||#startDate#||'%'
TRIM(STNDMSGUSEYN) LIKE '%'||#stndMsgUseYn#||'%'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(STATCYM, 1, 4), STNDMSGUSEYN ORDER BY YNTRSMTNOITM DESC ) TMP1 ) A WHERE ROWNUM < 20+1 ORDER BY ROWNUM
